item.title: 橡树树校友从紧张的信贷转向更高质量的信贷
item.description: 在过去的一年里，一对橡树资本集团（Oaktree Capital Group）的校友创办了 Shorecliff 资产管理公司（Shorecliff Asset Management），他们将投资方向从受压转向了更高质量的履约信贷，使他们所监管的资产总额增加了两倍多。【原文：In just the past year, a pair of Oaktree Capital Group alums — who pivoted to invest in higher-quality performing credit from stressed when they launched Shorecliff Asset Management — have more than tripled the sum of assets they oversee.】

item.title: Actis 据称将在新基建基金首次关闭时筹集 8 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，正在被 General Atlantic 收购的私募股权公司 Actis 已在一个新的新兴市场基础设施基金的首次交易中筹集了 8 亿美元。【原文：Actis, the private equity firm being acquired by General Atlantic, has raised $800 million at the first close of a new emerging markets-focused infrastructure fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特股票交易量意外飙升令交易所受益
item.description: 今年以来，沙特股票的交易量出人意料地激增，极大地推动了证券交易所运营商沙特塔达武尔集团控股公司（Saudi Tadawul Group Holding Co.【原文：Trading volumes of Saudi equities have unexpectedly surged this year in a big boost to the stock exchange operator Saudi Tadawul Group Holding Co.】

item.title: 债券交易员为新的点阵图做准备，三项削减成问题
item.description: 自今年年初以来，债券交易商大幅下调了对美联储 2024 年降息的预期，本周三，决策者将公布他们对基准利率的最新预测。【原文：After dialing back their expectations for 2024 Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts substantially since the start of the year, bond traders on Wednesday will take their next cue when policymakers release their own updated projections for their benchmark.】

item.title: 挪威预计今年实现北约国防开支目标
item.description: 挪威现在的目标是在2024年实现其作为北约防务联盟一部分的军费目标，比原计划提前两年，理由是安全局势 "严峻"。【原文：Norway now aims to reach its target for military spending as part of the NATO defense alliance already in 2024, two years earlier than planned, citing a “serious” security situation.】

item.title: 战争阻碍贸易，世贸组织将处理改革和渔业补贴问题
item.description: 世界贸易组织（WTO）总干事表示，尽管全球经济低迷带来了不利因素，而且艰难的政治环境也使达成共识变得困难重重，但该组织负责人仍将继续推进争端解决程序改革和打击渔业补贴。【原文：The head of the World Trade Organization will press ahead with reforms to its dispute process and a crackdown on fishery subsidies, even as a subdued global economy poses headwinds and a difficult political environment makes it hard to reach consensus, its director-general said.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金希望通过出售债券和首次公开募股为其消费雄心融资
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的主权财富基金正在考虑加速出售债务或获得银行贷款的计划，因为该基金正在寻找新的现金来源，以帮助支付王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼的万亿美元经济转型项目。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is considering plans to accelerate debt sales or obtain bank loans as it hunts for new sources of cash to help pay for Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s trillion-dollar economic transformation project.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 Wiedman 称人工智能的发展速度引发公司辩论
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc）内部正在酝酿一场争论，争论的焦点是人工智能将以多快的速度改变经济，以及如何从这场变革中获利。【原文：There’s a debate brewing inside BlackRock Inc. over how quickly artificial intelligence will transform the economy — and how to profit from the change.】

item.title: 据说性感茶叶将选择中金公司和摩根士丹利进行香港 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，湖南茶跃文化产业发展集团有限公司（又名 "性感茶"）已选定了在香港首次公开募股的银行，最快可能于今年在香港上市。【原文：Hunan Chayue Cultural Industry Development Group Ltd., also known as Sexy Tea, has selected banks for a Hong Kong initial public offering, which could take place as soon as this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Helaba 在市场困境中增加 5.56 亿欧元财产准备金
item.description: 德国赫拉巴银行（Helaba）拨出更多资金，以应对房地产市场恶化带来的影响。【原文：German bank Helaba put aside more money for souring property loans as it braces for the impact from worsening real estate markets.】

item.title: 国际能源署称部分买家回避俄罗斯原油导致俄罗斯石油收入下降
item.description: 据国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）称，由于西方对克里姆林宫制裁的监督更加严厉，一些买家对俄罗斯石油的需求减少，2月份俄罗斯的石油出口收入下降。【原文：Russia’s oil-export revenue declined in February as tougher monitoring of western sanctions against the Kremlin reduced some buyers’ appetite for the nation’s barrels, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 国际能源署称，欧佩克+减产将导致石油市场全年供应短缺
item.description: 据国际能源机构称，由于欧佩克+看来将在下半年继续减产，全球石油市场在整个2024年都将面临供应赤字，而不是之前预期的供应过剩。【原文：Global oil markets face a supply deficit throughout 2024, instead of the surplus previously expected, as OPEC+ looks set to continue output cuts in the second half of the year, according to the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 经济合作与发展组织警告：瑞士央行资产负债表过大，难以让人放心
台湾官员担心 "绵羊 "般的投资者使股票过热
item.description: 台湾官员似乎越来越担心股票市场的飙升，央行行长警告说，对本地交易所交易基金的狂热可能导致基准过热。【原文：Taiwanese officials appear increasingly concerned about a surging equity market, with the central bank governor warning a frenzy for local exchange-traded funds could cause the benchmark to overheat.】

item.title: 南非大麻公司向约翰内斯堡首次公开募股迈进
item.description: 南非医用大麻公司 Cilo Cybin Holdings Ltd. 表示，该公司已重新启动在约翰内斯堡证券交易所上市的计划。【原文：Cilo Cybin Holdings Ltd., a South African medical cannabis company, said it’s revived a plan to list on the stock exchange in Johannesburg.】

item.title: KKR 提议以 30 亿美元收购德国能源公司 Encavis
item.description: KKR & Co.已同意收购可再生能源生产商 Encavis AG，该交易对德国公司的估值约为 28 亿欧元（30 亿美元）。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to acquire renewable-energy producer Encavis AG in a deal that values the German company at about €2.8 billion ($3 billion).】

item.title: 太古希望在中国和东南亚投资更多医院
item.description: 几十年来，太古股份有限公司一直在中国经营香港的大型航空公司和焦炭装瓶厂，如今，该公司正向新的业务领域多元化发展：在中国和东南亚经营私立医院。【原文：After decades of operating Hong Kong’s marquee airline and coke bottling factories in China, Swire Pacific Ltd. is diversifying into a new line of business: private hospitals in China and Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯正与华尔街顶级银行商谈阿美石油公司股票出售事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正在与华尔街顶级银行就石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）的二次股票出售进行谈判，因为该公司正在推进近年来规模最大的一次股票发行。【原文：Saudi Arabia is in talks to add top Wall Street banks for a secondary share sale in oil giant Aramco, as it pushes ahead with one of the largest stock offerings in recent years, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国国家队狂购 500 亿美元后 ETF 购买降温
item.description: 根据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）的分析，中国的国有基金在过去五个月中购买了约 500 亿美元的中国股票，在国家最高立法机构召开年会期间，购买速度有所放缓。【原文：China’s state funds bought around $50 billion of the nation’s equities over the past five months, with purchases slowing during the annual meeting of the nation’s top legislators, according to an analysis by Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 中国 LGFV 长期债券在狂热需求中罕见卷土重来
item.description: 杭州市的一家地方政府融资机构售出了一笔 20 年期人民币债券，标志着投资者罕见地重返长期限票据市场，也标志着这个负债累累的行业继续保持韧性。【原文：A local government financing vehicle in the city of Hangzhou has sold a 20-year yuan bond, marking a rare investor return to long-dated notes and continued resilience in the heavily indebted sector.】

item.title: 印度计划改进经济数据并进行新的人口普查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度政府正计划采取一系列措施来提高经济数据的质量，其中包括启动拖延已久的人口普查。【原文：India’s government is planning a number of steps to improve the quality of its economic data, including kicking off a long-delayed population census, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 散户投资者购买了 12 月以来最多的日本股票
item.description: 随着日经 225 指数创下历史新高，日本散户投资者上周买入了自 12 月以来最多的国内股票，而今年大部分时间他们都没有买入。【原文：Japan’s retail investors bought the most domestic stocks last week since December, after staying away for most of this year as the Nikkei 225 Stock Average reached an all-time high.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯称欧洲央行必须在夏休前两次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行必须在 8 月夏季休会前两次降低借贷成本，并在年底前再降低两次，而不能受美国联邦储备局的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank must lower borrowing costs twice before its August summer break and another two times before the end of the year, without being swayed by the US Federal Reserve, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 约翰-刘易斯恢复盈利，但员工无法获得奖金
item.description: 约翰-刘易斯合伙公司（John Lewis Partnership Plc）恢复盈利，但这家英国零售商的员工将在四年内第三次与奖金失之交臂。【原文：John Lewis Partnership Plc is back in profit but the staff that own the UK retailer will miss out on a bonus for the third time in four years.】

item.title: 中国外交部长王毅将访问新西兰并举行会谈
item.description: 中国外交部长王毅将于下周访问新西兰，讨论贸易和地区问题。【原文：China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi is set to travel to New Zealand next week to discuss trade and regional issues.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
澳大利亚西部各州洪灾将促进油菜籽作物生长
item.description: 西澳大利亚州是澳大利亚最大的谷物生产州，该州的大雨应能让农民种植更多的油菜籽，不过这种增加可能会以牺牲大麦和小麦等作物为代价。【原文：Heavy rains in Western Australia, the country’s top grain producing state, should allow farmers to plant more canola, although the increase could come at the expense of crops like barley and wheat.】

item.title: 香港、大湾区雇主对 2024 年的雇佣前景不甚乐观
item.description: 毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）的一项调查显示，由于奖金减少，香港和大湾区的雇主对今年的招聘不那么乐观，这凸显了金融中心所面临的困难。【原文：Hong Kong and Greater Bay Area employers became less optimistic on hiring this year as bonus payments sank, underscoring the difficulties faced by the financial hub, according to a KPMG survey.】
